column4: does anyone know a program that will read the contents of a folder then produce a list and put it in html format so I can view the contents of folders in a web browser
Does anyone know a program that will read the contents of a folder then produce a list and put it in html format so I can view the contents of folders in a web browser?
why?  You can just type file:/// in your address bar
depends what you want to use it for
